<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="comment">/// PropList is expected to be sorted in ascending order of DXIL version.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">  OverloadKind Kind = <a href="#a6b04886780c4fb4764f2b6dbc1d3d2d9">getOverloadKind</a>(OverloadTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if the operation supports overload types and OverloadTy is valid</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// per the specified types for the operation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((ValidTyMask != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dxilopbuilder-cpp-/#a3fe8fcf1f03e5da864eb86be303a3216a9045349aadd51459c6dbe4f3b1c43217">OverloadKind::UNDEFINED</a>) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">      (ValidTyMask &amp; (uint16&#95;t)Kind) == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#a22a5df2ccfebeb3582950ac081af7057">makeOpError</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#ac64683c1985c78d81b50819a0b733f48">OpCode</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid overload type&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Perform necessary checks to ensure Opcode is valid in the targeted shader</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// kind</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::optional&lt;size&#95;t&gt; StIndexOrErr =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="#a3030fa8e5d4a78aef7c5a7fa00294ac6">getPropIndex</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(Prop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/opcodeproperty/#aef5a9770dd5d3385ac6d10b1dcca31f5">Stages</a>), DXILVersion);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!StIndexOrErr.has&#95;value())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#a22a5df2ccfebeb3582950ac081af7057">makeOpError</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#ac64683c1985c78d81b50819a0b733f48">OpCode</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;No valid stage for DXIL version &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   DXILVersion.getAsString());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint16&#95;t ValidShaderKindMask = Prop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/opcodeproperty/#aef5a9770dd5d3385ac6d10b1dcca31f5">Stages</a>&#91;&#42;StIndexOrErr&#93;.ValidStages;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ValidShaderKindMask == ShaderKind::removed)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#a22a5df2ccfebeb3582950ac081af7057">makeOpError</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#ac64683c1985c78d81b50819a0b733f48">OpCode</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Operation has been removed&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
